languages.text: {n}Вистенца прерывисто вздыхает, словно получила удар в живот.{/n} "Ваше сиятельство!.. Но... Но я же верой и правдой служила вашей династии, без устали укрощая эту строптивую планету..." {n}Оборвав саму себя, губернатор склоняет голову.{/n} "К-как вам будет угодно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вистенца прерывисто вздыхает, словно получила удар в живот.{/n} "Ваше сиятельство!.. Но... Но я же верой и правдой служила вашей династии, без устали укрощая эту строптивую планету..." {n}Оборвав саму себя, губернатор склоняет голову.{/n} "К-как вам будет угодно".

languages.text: {n}Vistenza lets out a ragged gasp as though she has been punched in the stomach.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But... But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-as you wish."

But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-As you wish."

languages.text: {n}维丝坦萨发出一声粗重的喘息，仿佛肚子被人打了一拳。{/n}“大人！可……可我一直都在忠心耿耿地位您的王朝服务。我一直都在不知疲倦地工作，来驯服这颗不守规矩的行星……”{n}她咽下了后面的话，点了点头。{/n}“如……如您所愿。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza lets out a ragged gasp as though she has been punched in the stomach.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But... But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-as you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}维丝坦萨发出一声粗重的喘息，仿佛肚子被人打了一拳。{/n}“大人！可……可我一直都在忠心耿耿地位您的王朝服务。我一直都在不知疲倦地工作，来驯服这颗不守规矩的行星……”{n}她咽下了后面的话，点了点头。{/n}“如……如您所愿。”

languages.text: {n}Vistenza suelta un jadeo rasgado como si le hubieran dado un puñetazo en el estómago.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero... Pero si he servido fielmente a su dinastía y he trabajado de forma incansable para domesticar este planeta salvaje...». {n}Se detiene y asiente.{/n} «Co... como desee».
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza lets out a ragged gasp as though she has been punched in the stomach.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But... But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-as you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza suelta un jadeo rasgado como si le hubieran dado un puñetazo en el estómago.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}! Pero... Pero si he servido fielmente a su dinastía y he trabajado de forma incansable para domesticar este planeta salvaje...» {n}Se detiene y asiente.{/n} «Co... como desee».

languages.text: {n}ヴィステンツァは腹を殴られたかのように荒々しくあえいでいる。{/n}「陛下！ですが…ですが、私はフォン・ヴァランシウス朝に忠義と正直を以てお仕えしてまいりました。この手に負えない星を管理するために休みなく働いてまいったのです…」{n}それ以上は口にするのを止めて、ヴィステンツァはうなずく。{/n}「お、仰せのままに」
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza lets out a ragged gasp as though she has been punched in the stomach.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But... But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-as you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィステンツァは腹を殴られたかのように荒々しくあえいでいる。{/n}「陛下！ですが…ですが、私はフォン・ヴァランシウス朝に忠義と正直を以てお仕えしてまいりました。この手に負えない星を管理するために休みなく働いてまいったのです…」{n}それ以上は口にするのを止めて、ヴィステンツァはうなずく。{/n}「お、仰せのままに」

languages.text: {n}Vistenza schnappt heiser nach Luft, als hätte sie einen Schlag in die Magengrube erhalten.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Aber ... aber ich habe Eurer Dynastie treu und ehrenhaft gedient, ich habe unermüdlich dafür gearbeitet, diesen aufsässigen Planeten zu zähmen ..." {n}Sie zwingt sich dazu, nicht weiterzusprechen, und nickt.{/n} "W-wie Ihr wünscht."
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza lets out a ragged gasp as though she has been punched in the stomach.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But... But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-as you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza schnappt heiser nach Luft, als hätte sie einen Schlag in die Magengrube erhalten.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Aber ... aber ich habe Eurer Dynastie treu und ehrenhaft gedient, ich habe unermüdlich dafür gearbeitet, diesen aufsässigen Planeten zu zähmen ..." {n}Sie zwingt sich dazu, nicht weiterzusprechen, und nickt.{/n} "W-wie Ihr wünscht."

languages.text: {n}Vistenza laisse échapper un hoquet de surprise, comme si on l'avait frappée au ventre.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Mais... Mais j'ai toujours servi votre dynastie avec loyauté et honnêteté, je travaille d'arrache-pied pour dompter cette planète indocile... » {n}Elle se retient d'en dire plus et hoche la tête.{/n} « C... Comme vous voudrez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza lets out a ragged gasp as though she has been punched in the stomach.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But... But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-as you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza laisse échapper un hoquet de surprise, comme si on l'avait frappée au ventre.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! Mais... Mais j'ai toujours servi votre dynastie avec loyauté et honnêteté, je travaille d'arrache-pied pour dompter cette planète indocile... » {n}Elle se retient d'en dire plus et hoche la tête.{/n} « C... Comme vous voudrez. »

languages.text: {n}Vistenza, midesine yumruk yemiş gibi cırtlak bir inilti çıkarıyor.{/n} "Ama {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!.. Hanedanınıza sadakatle ve dürüstçe hizmet ettim, bu serkeş gezegeni ehlîleştirmek için gece gündüz çalıştım..." {n}Daha fazla konuşmadan duruyor ve başını sallıyor.{/n} "Nasıl isterseniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza lets out a ragged gasp as though she has been punched in the stomach.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! But... But I have served your dynasty faithfully and honestly, I have worked tirelessly to tame this unruly planet..." {n}She stops herself from speaking any further and nods.{/n} "A-as you wish."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza, midesine yumruk yemiş gibi hırpani bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Ama {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!.. Hanedanınıza sadakatle ve dürüstçe hizmet ettim, bu serkeş gezegeni ehlîleştirmek için gece gündüz çalıştım..." {n}Daha fazla konuşmadan duruyor ve başını sallıyor.{/n} "Nasıl isterseniz..."
